wiscrobotics.name: Wisconsin Robotics
wiscrobotics.desc: A student organization at UW-Madison that builds Mars rovers to compete in the University Rover Competition.

rosjay.name: RosJay
rosjay.desc: A ROS client library written in pure Java.

combinatory_input.name: Combinatory Input
combinatory_input.desc: Provides combinatory processing data sources for joydev bindings.

combinatory_processing.name: Cbtry. Processing
combinatory_processing.desc: Functional abstraction over ROS nodes expressible using only combinatory logic.

roswell.name: Roswell
roswell.desc: A wrapper around the ROS Python API that eliminates some boilerplate for very simple nodes.

roboed.name: RoboED
roboed.desc: Robot programming framework for FRC based on composable data pipelines.

wird.name: Wird
wird.desc: Very inefficient backtracking syntax tree parser.

luscript.name: LuScript
luscript.desc: Simple lisp-style programming language implemented using ReSyN.

sor.name: SOR
sor.desc: Framework for distributed networks of nodes with a publisher-subscriber communication model.

commands4a.name: Commands4A
commands4a.desc: Annotation-based command parsing and execution framework. Originally built for Discord4J-powered Discord bots.

jsr305.name: JSR-305
jsr305.desc: Augments JSR-305 with one additional package-level annotation that marks everything as non-null by default.

web.title: Web Tech
web.desc: Things that you can put in your browser.

rsdirect.name: rsdirect
rsdirect.desc: A tiny webserver for serving redirects based on the host from which the server was reached.

ksort.name: Funky Lil Sorter
ksort.desc: Web app that lets users sort things manually via heap-sort.

site.name: phanta.xyz
site.desc: My personal website. You're looking at it right now!

wpd.name: Watch Paint Dry
wpd.desc: Static site generator and template engine. This website was built using WPD!

libseven.name: libseven
libseven.desc: Platform for creating and sharing fan-made chatrooms for the mobile game Mystic Messenger.

floof.name: Floof
floof.desc: Small web application framework for Node.js.

andesitejs.name: Andesite.js
andesitejs.desc: A preliminary attempt at building a clientside MVVM framework. Never completed.

site167.name: iowacityrobotics.org
site167.desc: Website for the Iowa City Robotics FRC team.

texdown.name: TeXDown
texdown.desc: In-browser markdown renderer with support for embedding LaTeX-style math.

vybemachine.name: Vybe Machine
vybemachine.desc: A (now defunct) web app for streaming randomly-selected music from Soundcloud.

chillingsmite.name: Chilling Smite
chillingsmite.desc: A (now defunct) web app for looking up League of Legends match data.

shlgl.name: SHLGL
shlgl.desc: A wrapper around LWJGL for developing 2D games.

openaargon.name: OpenAargon
openaargon.desc: A reimplementation of the puzzle game Aargon Deluxe in LWJGL.

fluid-drawers.name: Fluid Drawers
fluid-drawers.desc: An addon mod for Storage Drawers that implements drawers capable of storing fluids.

ae2fc.name: AE2 Fluid Crafting
ae2fc.desc: An addon mod for Applied Energistics 2 that allows for autocrafting with fluid ingredients.

tconevo.name: Tinkers' Evolution
tconevo.desc: An addon mod for Tinkers' Construct that offers deep integration for various materials from other mods.

psi-reagent-prototype.name: PSI Reagent Prototype
psi-reagent-prototype.desc: An addon for the PSI mod that implements spell reagents as originally intended by Vazkii. Never completed.

filing-cabinets.name: Filing Cabinets Refurbished
filing-cabinets.desc: A port of the filing cabinet feature from the original Extra Utilities mod.

psi-costs.name: Psio
psi-costs.desc: An addon mod for PSI that adds an energy cost to spellcasting.

curse-modpack-tool.name: Curse Modpack Tool
curse-modpack-tool.desc: A command-line tool for building CurseForge modpacks.

unclunkify.name: Unclunkify
unclunkify.desc: A mod that tweaks Minecraft's block breaking speeds to make the early game feel better.

algane.name: ALGANE
algane.desc: Mekanism addon with fancy laser guns.

aquinasmc.name: Aquinas MC
aquinasmc.desc: A Minecraft mod that reimplements some features from the first Deus Ex game. Never completed.

tinkersmemes.name: Tinkers' MEMES
tinkersmemes.desc: Tinkers' Construct addon with an energized tool modifier.

lazyae2.name: Lazy AE2
lazyae2.desc: Applied Energistics addon with easier crafting and automation tools.

libnine.name: libnine
libnine.desc: A Minecraft modding library that takes the boilerplate out of Forge.

wtflux.name: What The Flux
wtflux.desc: A Minecraft mod with various simple power generation machines.

epoxy.name: Epoxy
epoxy.desc: A reimplementation of the Technic Platform's Solder API in Node.js.

finalvoyage.name: A Final Voyage
finalvoyage.desc: A modpack and associated mod focused on nether exploration.

xbow.name: Project Crossbow
xbow.desc: A Minecraft laser simulation mod. Never completed.

mekores.name: Mekanism Ores
mekores.desc: Mekanism addon for ore processing compatibility.

mcrail.name: Minecraft Rail
mcrail.desc: A serverside modding framework that allows for complex custom behaviour without client mods. Never completed.

mobafort.name: MOBAFort
mobafort.desc: A series of server plugins implementing a MOBA-like game in Minecraft. Never completed.

rphud.name: RPHud
rphud.desc: A Minecraft mod that allows for the creation of custom HUDs via a simple scripting language.

ralogin.name: RA Login
ralogin.desc: A Bukkit plugin that awards loyalty points for logging into a Minecraft server. Built for a now-defunct server community.

war3.name: MC-War Client Mod
war3.desc: A client mod for the (now defunct) MC-War Minecraft server.

discord.title: Discord Bots
discord.desc: The machine overlords of the chatroom.

codearena.name: CodeArena
codearena.desc: A Discord bot that hosts code challenges, in which users compete to write code that solves a randomly-selected problem.

discordshell.name: DiscordShell
discordshell.desc: LunaBot, but reimplemented as a non-userbot. Offers various utilities via a POSIX-like command interface.

lunabot.name: LunaBot
lunabot.desc: A Discord userbot that provides various utilities and a POSIX-like command interface.

dartdoc.name: DartDoc
dartdoc.desc: A Discord bot for parsing Dart documentation and displaying it on user request. Originally built for the nyx Discord library's community server.

botah.name: Bot Against Humanity
botah.desc: A Discord bot for playing games of Cards Against Humanity.

sonarous.name: Sonarous
sonarous.desc: A Discord bot for downloading and playing music. It's not very good at it.

thoth.name: Thoth
thoth.desc: A tool for synchronizing files with an Android device over ADB.

jstimeline.name: JS Timeline
jstimeline.desc: A timeline web app built for an AP European History project.

systemsolver.name: System Solver
systemsolver.desc: A program for solving systems of linear equations using Gaussian elimination.

cellularpicnic.name: Cellular Picnic
cellularpicnic.desc: Langton's ant, implemented and visualized in the browser with Javascript.

syne.name: Syne
syne.desc: An audio waveform animation that uses the web audio API.
